tool_description: An API that fetches Crypto related News
name: Crypto News API
title: Crypto News API

api_list.name: Get articles from individual sources
api_list.description: Get crypto-related news from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-api2.p.rapidapi.com/news/cointelegraph"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-api2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{sourceid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Crypto- related News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all news about Crypto.
